001package imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay;
002
003import java.util.List;
004
005import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
006
007/**
008 * Interface specification for various implementations of the
009 * Delaunay triangulation.
010 */
011public interface DelaunayTriangulation {
012        
013        /**
014         * Returns a list of 2D triangles (implementing the {@link Triangle} interface) 
015         * contained in this triangulation. The list does not contain the initial outer 
016         * triangle.
017         * @return a list of triangles 
018         */
019        List<Triangle> getTriangles();
020        
021        /**
022         * Returns a list of 2D vertices (implementing the {@link Pnt2d} interface)
023         * contained in this triangulation. The sequence of points is assumed
024         * to be in the order of their actual insertion. The list does not contain the
025         * vertices of the initial (outer) triangle.
026         * @return a list of points
027         */
028        List<Pnt2d> getPoints();
029
030}
